
h1. Moderator actions on Comments


{info}
This feature is available since eXo KS 1.1
{info} 



# Moderator can promote comments of a specific question to be its answers.

*Step 1\.* Click on the question that have a comment you want to promote to its answer.

*Step 2.* Click on the promote icon !FAQPromoteIcon.png! to promote the comment into the answer of that question. After being promoted, the comment becomes the answer of its question.
